name: Sugar-Free Vanilla Pudding Pops
author: Pyure
summary: Sugar free vanilla pudding makes a great base for these frozen pops. If you prefer, eat the pudding straight from the fridge instead of freezing.
ingredients: ¼ cup Pyure Organic All Purpose Stevia Blend
1 teaspoon Pyure Organic Liquid Stevia Extract, vanilla flavor
directions: In saucepan, whisk together milk, Pyure Organic All Purpose Stevia Blend, Pyure Organic Liquid Stevia, vanilla flavor and cornstarch
Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly for 10 to 12 minutes, or until steaming and beginning to thicken
In separate heatproof bowl, whisk egg yolks
Pour half of the hot milk mixture into the eggs, whisking
Cook, stirring constantly, for 1 to 2 minutes or until thickened
Spoon pudding into frozen pop molds
Insert wooden pop sticks and freeze until firm, about 4 hours
